wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[4 January|4]]''' - [[Humphrey Carpenter]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography|biographer]] and [[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|editor]] dies.
* '''[[14 January|14]]-[[16 January|16]]''' - [[The One Ring Celebration]]. 
* '''?''' - [[Tolkien Gateway]]'s [[Tolkien Gateway:Chat|IRC channel]] goes online.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 191]]'' is published.
==February==
* '''[[25 February|25]]''' - Dutch translator [[Max Schuchart]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Vinyar Tengwar 47]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Walking with Bilbo]]'' is published.

==March==
* '''[[11 March|11]]''' - Cartographer [[Karen Wynn Fonstad]] dies.
* '''[[28 March|28]]''' - The parody book ''[[The Soddit]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 March|30]]''' - ''[[Unsung Heroes of The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 192]]'' is published.
==April==
* '''[[13 April|13]]''' - German translator [[Wolfgang Krege]] dies.
* '''[[15 April|15]]''' - ''[[Reconsidering Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[22 April|22]]''' - [[Norman Bird]], who played [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], dies.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - ''[[Interrupted Music: The Making of Tolkien's Mythology]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - ''[[The Forsaken Realm of Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 2]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Reconsidering Tolkien]]'' is published.
==May==
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 193]]'' is published.
==June==
* '''[[3 June|3]]''' - [[Tolkien Gateway]] opens as a wiki.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien's Ordinary Virtues]]'' is published.

==July==
* '''[[11 July|11]]-[[13 July|13]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing VII]].
* '''[[12 July|12]]''' - ''[[Der Berggeist]]'' is auctioned at Sotheby's.
* '''[[25 July|25]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Mighty Pen]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 194]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 43|''Mallorn'' 43]] is published.
==August==
* '''[[4 August|4]] - [[8 August|8]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Minya] - 1st International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in Stockholm, Sweden.
* '''[[5 August|5]]''' - ''[[Perilous Realms: Celtic and Norse in Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[9 August|9]]-[[10 August|10]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Symphony]]'' plays in Herodion, Greece.
* '''[[10 August|10]]''' - ''[[The Tolkien Society Guide to Oxford]]'' is published.
* '''[[11 August|11]]-[[15 August|15]]''' - The convention [[Tolkien 2005]] is held.

==September==
* '''[[16 September|16]]-[[18 September|18]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2005]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 195]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Rulebook]]'' is published.
==October==
* '''[[14 October|14]]''' - [[Bernie Zuber]], author and artist, dies.
* '''[[20 October|20]]''' - [[George Sayer]], friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
* '''[[25 October|25]]''' - The [[Tolkien Ensemble]] publish their fourth album, ''[[Leaving Rivendell]]''.
* '''[[26 October|26]]''' - Scholar [[Angus McIntosh]], pupil and friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Modern Middle Ages]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Sketchbook]]'' is published.
==November==
* '''[[8 November|8]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Tactics]]'' is released.
* '''[[22 November|22]]''' - ''[[Ringers: Lord of the Fans]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 196]]'' is published.
==December==
* '''[[25 December|25]]''' - ''[[Reading The Lord of the Rings|Reading The Lord of the Rings: New Writings on Tolkien's Classic]]'' is published.
* '''[[27 December|27]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'' is published.'''
* '''?''' - ''[[Vinyar Tengwar 48]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Art of Ruth Lacon]]'' is published.

==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[The Ruins of Osgiliath]]'' is released.
